# Bahishti Zewar

|language = Urdu
|genre = Fiqh
}}
Bahishti Zewar (}} ; ) is a volume of Deobandi beliefs and practices written by Ashraf Ali Thanwi and Ahmed Ali Fatehpuri.
Legacy
Barbara Daly Metcalf's 1992 book Perfecting Women is a commentary and history of the Bahishti Zewar.
